ability.name: Rolling Surge
ability.description: Unleash a high-speed roll that damages all enemies in your path.

ability.name: Spike Shot
ability.description: Fire a massive triangle projectile that travels through the entire screen and eliminates any enemy it touches.

ability.name: Shield Bash
ability.description: Stuns all enemies and projectiles within range for 1.5 seconds. Range upgrades increase the affected area.

ability.name: Star Flare
ability.description: Emit a radial burst (5) of star-shaped projectiles that damage all nearby foes.

ability.name: Hex Field
ability.description: Deploy a static hexagonal barrier (radius 200 units) that lasts 4 s, slowing enemies inside by 30% and dealing 10 HP/s (ticks every 1 s).

ability.name: Resonance Knockback
ability.description: Unleash a wide resonant shockwave that deals 25 damage, knocks enemies back 30 units, and pushes away enemy projectiles. Range upgrades boost both detection range and knockback power.
